sentences.en: And here lie the seeds of the whole subsequent upheaval.
sentences.cn: 这就包含着随之而来的全部变革的萌芽.

sentences.en: At a subsequent time he relapsed.
sentences.cn: 时隔不久,他故态复萌了.

sentences.en: But subsequent cases have removed many of these apprehensions.
sentences.cn: 然而,随后的案例又消除了许多类似的忧虑.

sentences.en: Eye problems can indicate an unhealthy lifestyle with subsequent suppression of the immune system.
sentences.cn: 患眼疾可能表明生活方式不健康，而且免疫系统同时受到抑制。

sentences.en: Her subsequent experiences were not of a reassuring nature, however.
sentences.cn: 可是她接下来的经历可不令人乐观.

sentences.en: In subsequent cases, the Court clarified the nature of these " FDF " variances.
sentences.cn: 在随后的案例中, 法院澄清了这些 “ 根本不同 ” 差异的实质.

sentences.en: Memory can be profoundly shaped by subsequent experience.
sentences.cn: 记忆会受到后来经历的深刻影响.

sentences.en: Much subsequent poetry in England was influenced by Imagist lord and practice.
sentences.cn: 后来的英国诗歌中有许多诗受到了意象主义的箴言和实践的影响.

sentences.en: Subsequent cases display similar ambivalence about the FDA's use of summary judgment.
sentences.cn: 随后的案件对食品和药物管理局利用即决审判的作法表示了相同的矛盾心理.
后来发生的事证实了我们的怀疑。

sentences.en: Subsequent events verified that his judgement was at fault.
sentences.cn: 接着发生的事件证实了他的判断有误.

sentences.en: The story will be continued in subsequent issues of the magazine.
sentences.cn: 小说将继续在以后几期杂志上连载.

sentences.en: There have been further developments subsequent to our meeting.
sentences.cn: 在我们的会议之后又有新发展。

sentences.en: These skills were passed on to subsequent generations.
They won only one more game subsequent to their Cup semi-final win last year.
sentences.cn: 继去年在杯赛半决赛中获胜后，他们仅又赢过一场比赛。

sentences.en: Those concerns were overshadowed by subsequent events.
sentences.cn: 随后发生的事使之前所关注的那些问题显得无足轻重。

phrases.tran_cn: 财务报表编制后发生的事项

trans.tran_cn: 后来的，随后的，作为结果而发生的，附随的
trans.tran_en: happening or coming after something else
